original_title: ずっと憧れだった上司の妻つかささんと布団の中でこっそり密着セックスに没頭したボク。 葵つかさ
overview: The boss's wife tsukasasan that I've always admired. Even if I knew it wasn't going to work, I couldn't control my emotions. One day, when he was invited to his house for a drink, the boss who drank too much broke down. Tsukasa could not stand the fact that he could not take the opportunity to prepare the futon and approached her, then the boss would go back to sleep... When I noticed, I was hiding in the futon with tsukasa. My boss is next to me, and my body is stuck, and I can't help but pile up my cuticle... .
title: I Was Always In Love With The Boss’ Wife, Tsukasa-san, So I Secretly Lost My Mind Fucking Her Hard And Tight Underneath The Futon Tsukasa Aoi
